summary: A simple main menu music replacer by Raven's Jig.
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is my first mod so I hope everyone enjoys it. This mod features one of the "Sons of Skyrim" remixes by Raven's Jig that replaces the music on the main menu.  Before anyone asks, No I do not own the song and Yes I did contact Raven and gain permission to do so, I can show the image of the email if I have to. If you wish to use this song for any mods I cannot give permission for it, you will have to ask Raven yourself by going to his website -  [url=http://www.ravensjig.com/]http://www.ravensjig.com/

[/url]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[b][size=3]Video Preview:[/size][/b]


[youtube]0Y6uoJhOrkk[/youtube]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[b][size=3]Update:[/size][/b]

(Not really an update but added a new and final replacer. If I do another update it will be to fix the known issues below.)

- Added Castle Replacer Option
- Cleaned up the Mod's Description page

Please inform me of any issue you may come across, though there shouldn't be any.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[b][size=3]Known Issues:[/size][/b]

The main menu song is a lot quieter then it's supposed to be. It can't be fixed with my current utilities. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Castle Replacer doesn't work as reliably as I had hoped, will leave as optional for now but I am removing it from the main file.
If anyone is willing to offer advice to help make it work reliably, please contact me.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Please don't forget to Endorse if you liked this mod. I know it's a simple mod but it makes a difference to know how people felt.


[size=3][b]Suggested Audio Mods:[/b][/size]

[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54387/?]Immersive Sounds - Compendium[/url] by [b]lazyskeever[/b]

[url=http://http//www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773/?]Audio Overhaul for Skyrim 2[/url] by[b] LoRd KoRn[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50443/?]Noric and Slavic Music[/url] by [b]ktomaczas[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31843/?]Solstheim Music in Skyrim[/url] by [b]AlexP

[/b][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46518/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D46518%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Fantasy Music Overhaul[/url] by [b]Aceeq[/b][/center]
author: Kayanakoe
